channel.title: AKA.SND - Push Back (on U) [Electronic]

item.title: AKA.SND - Push Back (on U) [Electronic]
item.dc:creator: yaneeck
item.description:
I like it.

It sounds to me as an industrial facility or something like it. I can’t explain it in more detail for now so I hope you get my point

When it comes to a vocal, I can think of some strong rap or…Bjork! Don’t laugh, it’s what I thought while I was listening to this track.

It’s also relaxing in a way.

Read full topic

item.title: AKA.SND - Push Back (on U) [Electronic]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Thanks, darwinmcd. Appreciated.

Tbh, I’m not happy using Tonsil au naturel, but I allowed myself that one as a placeholder in a demo.

Of course, coming from you, I’d consider any likening to DM as a huge compliment. So, certainly thanks there.

And, yeah, on vocals, I’m torn.

Read full topic

item.title: AKA.SND - Push Back (on U) [Electronic]
item.dc:creator: darwinmcd
item.description:
Great song man! With the sound design, I felt like I was hearing a lost B-Side from Depeche Mode’s Speak & Spell album (that’s a compliment BTW). Agree this is primed for vocals but also feel it could work well as an instrumental.

Read full topic

item.title: AKA.SND - Push Back (on U) [Electronic]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
It’s in the ‘indie synth-pop’ territory in my head, which covers a broad range of sounds, but interested to know what you’d consider it.

If you have a point of reference - a track you think it would fit naturally alongside, sound-wise - would be interested to hear that too.

Read full topic

item.title: AKA.SND - Push Back (on U) [Electronic]
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
I wouldn’t call this Pop.
It sounds like I can sing on it (maybe), and I for sure don’t sing Pop.

Read full topic

item.title: AKA.SND - Push Back (on U) [Electronic]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Thanks - and thanks also to @INDIR3CT

I think it needs a bit of attention in the mix as some parts are being overwhelmed, especially later in the track.
Just need to know some bits back a little to make a bit of space.

 
Re: vocals

It has a kinda song structure*, and while I want to finish it as a vocal track, it could possibly stand as a purely instrumental piece.

I’m not actually sure which way to finish it up as a vocal track. I’ll have to give it much more thought. (Got a few pieces in need of lyrics/vocals now.)

* intro, verse, pre-chorus, chorus, verse, pre-chorus/bridge, chorus, (repeat), outro

Read full topic

Dannnng. That is awesome. Would love to see what this is like with vocals! This is put together very well regardless…

item.title: AKA.SND - Push Back (on U) [Electronic]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
(Been sitting on this for a while, while taking a bit of a break from music making.)

 

AKA.SND - Push Back (on U) [4:20]

Demo instrumental for a heavy, electronic/electro-pop track. (There will be vocals at some point.)

 

Thoughts and feedback welcome, as always.
(Of course, feel free to leave comments on Soundcloud too.)
